App Name: Chat Style Package Name: black.tools.chatandtextstyle

Brief

Transform your everyday texting into a work of art with 'Chat Style'! This application turns your chat sessions into beautifully styled conversations through a plethora of stylish fonts and text decorations. Whether it's for WhatsApp, Snapchat, Instagram, or any other messaging app, 'Chat Style' elevates your messaging game, providing an elegant touch that will leave everyone captivated.
